author: Wsj Staff
title: Fewer High-School Grads Enrolled in College Last Year - Real Time Economics - WSJ
text:
Fresh high-school graduates are less likely to be enrolled in college than they have been at any point since 2013, as the jobs recovery extends to even teenage workers. New Labor Department data show that of the 2.9 million people aged 16 to 24 who graduated from high school in 2017, about 66.7% were enrolled [â€¦]
